subject: what is the purpose of TestDecorator
msgSnippet: Hello All, Tomorrow i have a presentation to give on JUnit. So kindly help me with some doubts. i need a description on how to use TestDecorator
messageBody:
Hello All,

Tomorrow i have a presentation to give on JUnit. So kindly help me with some doubts.

i need a description on how to use TestDecorator (junit.extensions.TestDecorator) and where we exactly use it. Give me a simple example if possible.

i appreciate ur time ...

thanks and regards,
Srihari.
